thread.title: Rosa Pol Pittser
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Rosa Pol Pittser

author: Rosa Pol Pittser
title: Rosa Pol Pittser
text:
Been a while since I've had this ham, have missed the wonderful taste of the Attic Aged Ham!! My family has bought hams with Burgers' Smokehouse since I can remember, it is a taste of Spain, for us!
Ordering is quick and easy, delivered in 2 days!
Can't wait to order again ðŸ˜Š
